description: This file defines a lightweight, custom serialization/deserialization utility called SafeCodec for encoding and decoding various data structures such as string sets, cart lines, promotional offers, and fee settings used in a food delivery application. It handles escaping special characters and provides functions to serialize complex objects into strings and parse them back.

classes.name: SafeCodec
classes.description: A singleton object providing static methods for encoding and decoding various data types into a custom string format, used for persistent storage or transfer within the app.

methods.name: encodeStringSet
methods.description: Encodes a set of strings into a single string with pipe delimiters, escaping special characters.

methods.name: decodeStringSet
methods.description: Decodes a string back into a set of strings, handling escape sequences and delimiters.

methods.name: encodeCartLines
methods.description: Serializes a list of StoredCartLine objects into a newline-delimited string, with each line representing a cart item.

methods.name: decodeCartLines
methods.description: Deserializes a string into a list of StoredCartLine objects, parsing each line and handling escape sequences.

methods.name: encodeAppliedPromo
methods.description: Serializes an AppliedPromo object into a string with fields separated by pipe characters.

methods.name: decodeAppliedPromo
methods.description: Deserializes a string into an AppliedPromo object, parsing fields and validating.

methods.name: encodeFeeSettings
methods.description: Serializes FeeSettings object into a string with fields separated by pipe characters.

methods.name: decodeFeeSettings
methods.description: Deserializes a string into a FeeSettings object, parsing and validating fields.
